# Portfolio Website 🚀

Welcome to my personal portfolio website! 🌟

## 🌐 Live Demo
Check it out here: [LeHuyVuu.github.io](https://LeHuyVuu.github.io)

---

## 📁 Project Structure
Here is an overview of the project's structure:
- **.github/workflows**: CI/CD workflows for deployment.
- **css/**: All stylesheets for the website.
- **img/**: Images and media files used in the project.
- **js/**: JavaScript files for added functionality.
- **index.html**: The main HTML file for the portfolio website.

---

## ✨ Features
- Fully responsive design 📱💻
- Modern and clean UI/UX 🎨
- Showcases projects and skills 📂
- Deployed using GitHub Pages 🌐
